title: Introduction
description: Pinexio is a customizable, modern documentation template designed to help developers create, manage, and present their project documentation effortlessly. With support for MDX, light and dark themes, and a powerful content management system, Pinexio makes documentation easy and fun!

body.raw:
# Welcome to **Pinexio**

## The Ultimate Documentation Template

Welcome to the **Pinexio** Documentation Template! 🎉 This template is designed to make your documentation journey seamless, flexible, and **beautiful**. Built with the latest technologies, **Pinexio** gives you everything you need to create, manage, and present your documentation effortlessly.

## Why Choose Pinexio?

With **Pinexio**, building documentation for your projects has never been easier. Whether you're documenting a personal project, a company product, or a blog, **Pinexio** has got you covered. Here's why you should give it a try:

- **Highly Customizable UI** 🌈: The template comes with a flexible, highly customizable UI that can adapt to both **light** and **dark themes**. With just a few tweaks in the `global.css` file, you can create the perfect look for your documentation.
- **Minimal UI Libraries (95% Custom-built)** 🚀: While we use minimal third-party UI libraries, **Pinexio** gives you a sleek and unique UI with almost everything custom-built for maximum performance and flexibility.
- **Effortless Content Management with MDX** 📚: The **MDX** support allows you to write your documentation in a highly readable, rich format while including JSX components. No more struggles with mixing Markdown and JSX.
- **Powerful Contentlayer Integration** 🔍: Thanks to **Contentlayer**, your MDX pages are automatically indexed and fully searchable. Just drop an MDX file in the `/docs` folder, and a new page is created, ready for the world to see! Plus, the search bar is automatically updated to reflect new content.

## What Makes Pinexio Special?

Pinexio solves a common problem for developers who struggle with creating and managing documentation. With extensive research and development, we've built the solution to make this process **fast**, **efficient**, and **scalable**.

Here’s what makes Pinexio stand out:

- **Zero Setup Hassle**: Simply create an MDX file in the `/docs` folder, and your page is live. It’s that simple!
- **Searchable Pages**: All your documentation pages are instantly searchable, with Contentlayer ensuring fast indexing.
- **Built for Modern Development**: We’re using cutting-edge technologies to give you the best experience:
  - **Next.js 15** for the most performant, SEO-friendly React framework.
  - **Tailwind CSS 4** for responsive, customizable design with minimal effort.
  - **MDX** to easily blend documentation with interactive React components.

## Technologies Behind Pinexio

- **Next.js 15** (Latest React Framework)
- **Tailwind CSS 4** (Modern, utility-first CSS framework)
- **MDX** (Markdown + JSX for rich content)
- **Contentlayer** (Seamless content management)

---

Pinexio is **open-source**, which means it's free to use and customize to your needs. Whether you're documenting your personal projects or building something bigger, Pinexio is here to make your life easier.

## Ready to Start?

The best part? You don't need to be an expert to get started. Simply clone the repository, and you'll have a powerful documentation site up and running in no time!

---

Need help? Got questions? Open an issue on our GitHub repository or join our community for support and feedback. Let's make documentation fun again! 🚀

[Link to Demo](#) | [View GitHub Repo](https://github.com/sanjayc208/pinexio)

---

_Happy Documenting! 📝_
